bill.summary:
Nursing Home Workforce Support and Expansion Act of 2024
This bill provides funding through FY2028 and otherwise revises a grant program for states and Indian tribes to support workers in nursing facilities, home health agencies, and related settings. Grant recipients must use funds to provide eligible workers with wage subsidies, educational assistance, and access to affordable child care and transportation.
